08-29-2024: - Fixed being able to purchase globally during its brief respawn period
- Fixed the camera moving away from the player if you will respawn, rather than following the ragdoll
07-18-2024: - Soul {{ItemIcon|Item=Rebirth|Size=20}} Rebirth (new T4 Vitality item): After you die, you will respawn in 4 seconds where you died with 40% of your Max Health. Cooldown: 220s. Also innately grants +20% Weapon Damage and +10% Cooldown Reduction.
